revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Belkin F5D8235-4 v3 a.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = N+ Wireless Router |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://www.belkin.com/us/support-product?rnId=336 |dl = |fandom = Belkin_F5D8235-4_v21xx |wikidevi = Belkin_F5D8235-4_v2_(v21xx) |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Belkin |model = F5D8235-4 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v2 (v21xx) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/22/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Belkin_F5D8235-4_v21xx |wlclass = N300 |series = F5D8235-4 |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = K7SF5D8235-4B |icid = 3623A-F5D82354B |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3052; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 384 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640DBTC-90G;MX S091027 29LV640DBTC-90G 3A368500; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620FTP-6;;Winbond W9812G61H-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8366SR; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:22:75 |oui = 00:22:75 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;3.2;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.2 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600 8N1),, J2 |jtag = no |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Belkin_N+_XXXXXX,Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170 |defaultssid_regex = ^Belkin_N+_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,,^Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170$ |default_ch = |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTR-234GN |manuf_rev = V03 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/20/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WRTR-234GN (WRTR-234GN_V03) Belkin released two v2 models.. *v20xx, with RTL8366RB switch, working with above mentioned firmware on pg4 of the DD-WRT forum post *v21xx, with RTL8366SR switch, [https://svn.dd-wrt.com/ticket/1997 not currently working with DD-WRT (assigned on DD-WRT bug-tracker)] :The default SSID is ''Belkin_N+_XXXXXX'' where ''XXXXXX'' is the last three octets of the WLAN MAC address (upper case letters). :The device assumes the SSID of ''Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170'' for a brief moment when resetting to factory defaults. :''Belkin_N+_Guest'' is the default SSID for the guest network, but this is not enabled by default. The power adapter included with the device (v2110) is a :''DVE'' DSA-20P-10 US 120180 (12V, 1.5A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=53235 On the DD-WRT forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=21998 On the OpenWrt forums] (pic of v20xx model, console pinout, etc) *[http://sleclire.blogspot.com/2010/09/interfacing-belkin-f5d8235-4-v2000.html interfacing the Belkin F5D8235-4 v2000 router via its serial console (v20xx)] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=53235 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/belkin/belkin_f5d8235-4_v2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/belkin/f5d8235-4 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Reverting== ===Reverting dd-wrt=== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=521053#521053 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
Header J2
USB port <- [3.3V] (Tx) (Rx) (GND) -> To RT3052
 {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
